name: Release 0.6.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

* for packaging and dependency management with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "ofiuco", version = "0.6.3")

poetry = use_extension("@ofiuco//python:extensions.bzl", "poetry")
poetry.parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
use_repo(poetry, "poetry")
```

## What's Changed
* Fix: add text/html to the Accept header by @smertnik3sh in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/110
* Fix: allow packages have dependencies with extas by @smertnik3sh in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/111
* Fix: add configs for the ancient pythons by @smertnik3sh in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/112
* Index tests and disable Rust by default by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/113

## New Contributors
* @smertnik3sh made their first contribution in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/110

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3

name: Release v0.5.3
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: use module internal repositories for wheels and sdists by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/104


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3

name: Release 0.5.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

* for packaging and dependency management with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "ofiuco", version = "0.5.2")

poetry = use_extension("@ofiuco//python:extensions.bzl", "poetry")
poetry.parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
use_repo(poetry, "poetry")
```


## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

* for packaging and dependency management with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

toolchain_name = "python"
python_version = "3.13"

# Setup rules_python
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "fa532d635f29c038a64c8062724af700c30cf6b31174dd4fac120bc561a1a560",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.1/rules_python-1.5.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(toolchain_name, python_version)

# Setup ofiuco
http_archive(
    name = "ofiuco",
    sha256 = "dd1bfda704c7ac8ffbafde0b80864af3112d7e462db17ccb7591f7da40974f66",
    strip_prefix = "ofiuco-0.5.2",
    url = "https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/releases/download/v0.5.2/ofiuco-0.5.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@ofiuco//python:repositories.bzl", install_poetry_dependencies = "install_dependencies")

install_poetry_dependencies(toolchain_name, python_version)

load("@ofiuco//python:poetry_parse.bzl", "poetry_parse")

poetry_parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
```

## What's Changed
* post 0.5.1 updates and proper 0.5.2 release by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/98
* add :all target by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/101


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

## Using WORKSPACE

* for packaging and dependency management with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/)

```starlark

toolchain_name = "python"
python_version = "3.13"

# Setup rules_python
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "9f9f3b300a9264e4c77999312ce663be5dee9a56e361a1f6fe7ec60e1beef9a3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.1/rules_python-1.4.1.tar.gz",
)

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(toolchain_name, python_version)

# Setup ofiuco
http_archive(
    name = "ofiuco",
    sha256 = "e53cbb3cc27922c76ad26c076be26a3010370f607da2cc589946ddef0fd48a68",
    strip_prefix = "ofiuco-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/releases/download/v0.5.0/ofiuco-0.5.0.tar.gz",

    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",

```

## What's Changed
* Python TOML parser by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/93
* add shebang to py_zip by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/94
* Feature/shebang by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/95
* feat: link host toolchain into defs repository by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/96


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/compare/v0.4.6...v0.5.0

```starlark
load("@ofiuco//python:poetry_parse.bzl", "poetry_parse")

poetry_parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
```

## What's Changed
* Feat/test by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/73
* Rename to rules_ophiuchus by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/74
* feat: rename s/host/system/g and use host interpret from rules_python by @oxidase in https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/pull/75


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/oxidase/ofiuco/compare/v0.3.6...v0.3.7

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_poetry", version = "0.3.6")

poetry = use_extension("@rules_poetry//python:extensions.bzl", "poetry")
poetry.parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
use_repo(poetry, "poetry")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_poetry",
    sha256 = "a393f7f8ed8579b0044deac241bd075da466dfcf3e14f2a1c738f162e73c3125",
    strip_prefix = "rules_poetry-0.3.6",
    url = "https://github.com/oxidase/rules_poetry/releases/download/v0.3.6/rules_poetry-0.3.6.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_poetry//python:poetry_parse.bzl", "poetry_parse")
load("@rules_poetry//python:repositories.bzl", install_poetry_dependencies = "install_dependencies")

install_poetry_dependencies()

poetry_parse(
    name = "poetry",
    lock = "//:poetry.lock",
)
```
